name: Giant Eagle
languages: Giant Eagle  understands Common and Auran but can't speak them

specialAbilities.name: Keen Sight
specialAbilities.description: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
